title: [Bad]  You grant Groupon the right to Personal Information in connection with your User Content.

tosdr.case: [Bad]  You grant Groupon the right to Personal Information in connection with your User Content.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  You grant Groupon the right to use, display and distribute any Personal Information in connection with your User Content, including the right to sell such rights to Personal Information.
